summary: Year 1942  was a common year starting on Thursday  of the Gregorian calendar.
full_text: 1942  was a common year starting on Thursday  of the Gregorian calendar, the 1942nd year of the Common Era  and Anno Domini  designations, the 942nd year of the 2nd millennium, the 42nd year of the 20th century, and the 3rd year of the 1940s decade.
